overview: Scent uVa Butch is a documentary exploring the complexity, fluidity and sensuality of lesbians who choose to call themselves butch. Find out what separates the butch from the boys and get an up-close look at the lives of over twenty butches -- from a 23-year-old Texas charm school graduate to a 53-year-old mohawk-sporting diesel dyke.
title: Scent uVa Butch
